text: Justine Greening is a British politician. She is a member of the Conservative Party. Greening was Secretary of State for Education from July 2016 to January 2018, and an MP from 2005 to 2018. ==References== == Other websites == * Message from Justine Greening Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Accountants Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Politicians from Yorkshire
title: Justine Greening
